channel.title: Girls Under Glass on
channel.description: Recent content in Girls Under Glass on

item.title: Believe in Yourself
item.description: [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.md#but-youve-been-nowhere-and-youve-seen-nothing-vyl-wnanory|You were my hero, adore an altar I adorn with flowers]] [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.md#but-youve-been-nowhere-and-youve-seen-nothing-vyl-wnanory|You were my god, my guilded picture of my fantasy]] [[songs/s/stick_to_your_guns/diamond/empty_heads.

item.title: In The Darkness
item.description: [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_burden.md#you-cant-save-me-vyl-wnanory|In the darkness]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_burden.md#you-cant-save-me-vyl-wnanory|I keep you warm]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_burden.md#you-cant-save-me-vyl-wnanory|In the coldest winter]] [[songs/s/slipknot/5__the_gray_chapter/the_burden.md#you-cant-save-me-vyl-wnanory|I take you in my arms]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/any_other_way.md#you-act-stoic-like-a-soldier-vyl-wnanory|I feel your warm skin]] [[songs/d/dead_astronauts/arms_of_night/any_other_way.

item.title: Is This The Place
item.description: [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#close-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|And I close my eyes]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#close-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|I see more than I see]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#close-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|Then I see my life]] [[songs/b/boy_harsher/careful/the_look_you_gave_jerry.md#close-my-eyes-vyl-wnanory|And I feel more than I feel]] [[songs/t/three_days_grace/life_starts_now/world_so_cold.

item.title: It’s You
item.description: [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|You are my newest friend]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|There is nothing to pretend]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|My arms do keep you warm]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|My body keeps you calm]] [[songs/p/porcupine_tree/in_absentia/trains.

item.title: Love is in My World
item.description: [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/not_the_sun.md#yeah-we-were-solving-it-vyl-wnanory|Gently my soul is touching your dreams]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/not_the_sun.md#yeah-we-were-solving-it-vyl-wnanory|Softly my tear drops on to your body]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/not_the_sun.md#yeah-we-were-solving-it-vyl-wnanory|The tragic of existence makes my dream breathe]] [[songs/b/brand_new/the_devil_and_god_are_raging_inside_me/not_the_sun.

item.title: Never Go

item.title: Torture
item.description: [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|When I see a black hole,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|The chasm is here,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|The chasm is nowhere]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.md#we-live-a-life-of-excess-shit-thats-all-that-we-know-vyl-wnanory|And you go one step further,]] [[songs/d/deez_nuts/bout_it/shot_after_shot.

item.title: Touch Me
item.description: [[songs/d/daft_punk/get_lucky/get_lucky__radio_edit.md#the-present-has-no-ribbon-vyl-wnanory|We try to live a dream]] [[songs/d/daft_punk/get_lucky/get_lucky__radio_edit.md#the-present-has-no-ribbon-vyl-wnanory|Of peace and harmony]] [[songs/d/daft_punk/get_lucky/get_lucky__radio_edit.md#the-present-has-no-ribbon-vyl-wnanory|Relax and touch my skin]] [[songs/d/daft_punk/get_lucky/get_lucky__radio_edit.md#the-present-has-no-ribbon-vyl-wnanory|But close your eyes]] [[songs/b/breaking_benjamin/phobia/here_we_are.

item.title: Whatever Makes You Happy
item.description: [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|Whatever makes you happy]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|I’ll do it for you]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|Whatever makes you happy]] [[songs/l/la_dispute/somewhere_at_the_bottom_of_the_river_between_vega_and_altair/last_blues_for_bloody_knuckles.md#there-is-nothing-you-can-do-vyl-wnanory|I am, I’m there for you]] [[songs/m/monty_python/the_ultimate_monty_python_rip_off/always_look_on_the_bright_side_of_life.

item.title: When I Think About You
item.description: [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|We stay together, together in my dream,]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|When we were closer love was to be seen]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.md#what-will-it-take-for-you-to-notice-vyl-wnanory|Yeah I can feel you, hear your distant voice,]] [[songs/r/rise_against/the_black_market/methadone.
